mapper.sql: ID, CABLE_NAME, CABLE_LENGTH, CABLE_STATUS, CABLE_LOCATION, CONTRACT_ID, CRT_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into T_OAM_CABLE (ID, CABLE_NAME, CABLE_LENGTH, CABLE_STATUS, CABLE_LOCATION, CONTRACT_ID, CRT_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cableLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cableStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cableLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into T_OAM_CABLE
ID,
CABLE_NAME,
CABLE_LENGTH,
CABLE_STATUS,
CABLE_LOCATION,
CONTRACT_ID,
CRT_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cableLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cableStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cableLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update T_OAM_CABLE
CABLE_NAME = #{cableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CABLE_LENGTH = #{cableLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CABLE_STATUS = #{cableStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CABLE_LOCATION = #{cableLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_ID = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_OAM_CABLE set CABLE_NAME = #{cableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CABLE_LENGTH = #{cableLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CABLE_STATUS = #{cableStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CABLE_LOCATION = #{cableLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_ID = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.* from t_oam_cable t left join t_oam_cable_section a on t.id = a.cable_id left join t_common_section b on a.section_id = b.id where b.id = #{id}
